name: Mini Bike Madness
description:
You play as a miniature dirt bike rider in a world of giant obstacles.  Collect the coins and return to the red flag to complete the level  but be careful not to hit your head!

CONTROLS:

W - Accelerate

S - Bake

A - Rotate counter clockwise

D - Rotate clockwise

SPACE - Change directions

Levels include:

Polluted Beach - Traverse all the empty pizza boxes, bottles and other garbage left on this polluted beach.

Garage - Someone really needs to tidy this place up. There are tools and junk everywhere and even some old Halloween decorations.

Kitchen Sink - The sink is full of dirty dishes and those soap suds are bouncy.

If you liked the game or if you have ideas for the game or new levels please let me know in the comments section.
